The 1st step in fixing a problem is recognizing there is one.

The next step is to reflect upon how consciously or subconsciously, you've contributed to it.

Perhaps the hardest step, is to then look beyond yourself to see how others are affected.

This is the ♥️of a solution.

Without top-down motivation and support, it’s easy for employees to lie low or cower in complacency.
Innovation is about shifting from a culture of management to a culture of leadership
Optimism is a critical skill needed to explore innovation
“A new type of thinking is essential if mankind is to survive and move toward higher levels.” – Albert Einstein

Whenever the world moves ahead, it is because someone has a vision of new opportunities and possibilities, one that creates a community where everyone believes in better outcomes for themselves and others.
Be the reason someone feels heard.

An article by @siamakmasnavi that I hope is worth your time...

In @Gartner_inc's Hype Cycle, we may be on the path toward the "trough of disillusionment" before finally establishing utility and scalable value in web3.
@siamakmasnavi @kevinrose Thank you for including me in your article, @siamakmasnavi 🙏

This is a hard thing to read if you've experienced #crypto or #NFT losses. But @kevinrose is right. #web3 isn't about the money-motivated efforts that led to web1's dotbomb phase. It's about the phoenix that rises as a result, in this case a foundation for a new era of the web.

24 hours isn't a construct for success or happiness.
It's a reminder to find time for you and those important to you...as you can...to grow in any direction you truly believe in and hold dear.
